    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1

    Facet RoomCharacteristics_Detail

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1:RoomCharacteristics_Summary
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1:RoomCharacteristics_Detail

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<RoomCharacteristicsDetail architectureCode="2" compositeInd="true" floor="1234" gender="Male" invBlockCode="Example String Value" nonSmokingInd="true" sharedRoomInd="true" sizeMeasurement="Example String Value" typeCode="Example String Value" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1">
    <LocationCode>Annex room</LocationCode>
    <AccessibilityFeature description="Door locks at wheelchair height." quantity="2">
        <DisabilityFeature_Enum>Accessibility to goods and services</DisabilityFeature_Enum>
    </AccessibilityFeature>
    <SecurityFeature description="Smoke alarm in room." quantity="1">
        <SecurityFeature>2nd lock on guest doors</SecurityFeature>
    </SecurityFeature>
    <BedTypeCode>Dorm bed</BedTypeCode>
    <Category>Budget</Category>
    <ClassificationCode>1 room cabin</ClassificationCode>
    <ViewCode>Annex room</ViewCode>
</RoomCharacteristicsDetail>

      Example JSON

      {
  "RoomCharacteristicsDetail" : {
    "gender" : "Male",
    "invBlockCode" : "Example String Value",
    "architectureCode" : "2",
    "floor" : 1234,
    "typeCode" : "Example String Value",
    "sizeMeasurement" : "Example String Value",
    "nonSmokingInd" : true,
    "compositeInd" : true,
    "sharedRoomInd" : true,
    "LocationCode" : {
      "value" : "Annex room"
    },
    "AccessibilityFeature" : [ {
      "@type" : "AccessibilityFeature",
      "quantity" : 2,
      "description" : "Door locks at wheelchair height.",
      "DisabilityFeature_Enum" : {
        "value" : "Accessibility to goods and services"
      }
    } ],
    "SecurityFeature" : [ {
      "@type" : "SecurityFeature",
      "quantity" : 1,
      "description" : "Smoke alarm in room.",
      "SecurityFeature" : {
        "value" : "2nd lock on guest doors"
      }
    } ],
    "BedTypeCode" : {
      "value" : "Dorm bed"
    },
    "Category" : {
      "value" : "Budget"
    },
    "ClassificationCode" : {
      "value" : "1 room cabin"
    },
    "ViewCode" : {
      "value" : "Annex room"
    }
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        gender
        Used to request or specify a gender assignment for a room. Note: Typically used by Hosteliers.
        Details
        Type Gender_Enum
        Example Value Male
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        invBlockCode
        A code or identification number that identifies the room stay as part of a group, package tour, or block of rooms designated in the inventory.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        architectureCode
        Specifies the architectural style of a room. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Architectural Style Code (ARC).
        Details
        Type OTA_Code
        Example Value 2
        Required false
        Pattern [0-9A-Z]{1,4}(\.[A-Z]{3}(\.X){0,1}){0,1}
        Max Occurrences 1
        floor
        Floor on which the room is located.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:positiveInteger
        Example Value 1234
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        typeCode
        Specific system room type code, ex: A1K, A1Q etc.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        sizeMeasurement
        Textual description of room dimensions.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:string
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        sharedRoomInd
        If TRUE, the room requires or has sharing available. Note: Typically used by Hosteliers.

      • Indicators inherited from http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1:RoomCharacteristics_Summary

        nonSmokingInd, compositeInd
